003
004import kut.*;
005import test.J00all;
006import main.*;
007import pgs.*;
008
009/** Main class.*/
010public class Main {
011  static String help () {
012    return
013      "Use MarketModelsJ [help | version | init | update | test <request> | <request>]\n" +
014      "where\n" +
015      "  help   : Shows this message.\n" +
016      "  version: Shows program version.\n" +
017      "  init   : Initializes program.\n" +
018      "           Must be called only the first time that the program is called.\n" +
019      "  test   : Run tests\n" +
020      "  update : Updates data base.\n" +
021      "  request: Request sent by browser."
022    ;
023  }
024
025  /**
026    Program entry.
027    @param args. Arguments.
028  */
029  public static void main (String[] args) {
030    Log.init(Path.cat(Cts.dataPath, "log.tb"), 100);
031
032    if (args.length == 2 && args[0].equals("test")) {
033      Sys.print(J00all.process(args[1]));
034      return;
035    }
036
037    if (args.length != 1 && (args.length != 2 || !args[1].equals(""))) {
038      Sys.println(help());
039      return;
040    }
041
042    String rq = args[0];
043    switch (rq) {
044      case "update":
045        Updater.run();
046        break;
047      case "version":
048        Sys.println(Cts.version);
049        break;
050      case "init":
051        Db.init();
052        break;
053      case "help":
054      case "":
055        Sys.println(help());
056        break;
057      default: {
058        Dic<String> drq = Js.ro(rq);
059        String source = Js.rs(drq.get("source"));
060        switch (source) {
061          case "LogPg":
062            Sys.print(LogPg.process(drq));
063            break;
064          case "GlobalPg":
065            Sys.print(GlobalPg.process(drq));
066            break;
067          case "ModelsPg":
068            Sys.print(ModelsPg.process(drq));
069            break;
070          default: throw new RuntimeException(
071              "Value of source (" + source + ") is not valid"
072            );
073        }
074      }
075    }
076  }
077
078}
